profile.name: Anas
profile.bio: I specialize in Network/Web Pentesting, Malware Development, and System Internals. Building advanced tooling and breaking complex systems.

projects.title: Process Injector
projects.description: A Rust-based tool designed for process injection using WinAPI and NativeAPI.

projects.title: DLL Injector
projects.description: Advanced tool performing DLL injection, useful for testing application defenses and red teaming.

projects.title: CORS Scanner
projects.description: A Python tool that scans for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) vulnerabilities.

projects.title: BoF ToolKit
projects.description: A toolkit assisting in identifying and exploiting buffer overflow vulnerabilities.

articles.title: Introduction to Malware Development: PE Parsing
articles.summary: Understanding the Portable Executable (PE) format is crucial for malware development. This article covers the basics of parsing PE headers to find exported functions manually.

articles.title: Red Teaming Active Directory
articles.summary: Strategies for lateral movement, kerberoasting, and domain dominance in hardened Windows environments.
